ResearchProjectDef.label: beekeeping
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to keep bees to produce honey from nearby plants. Honey can be used in creation of sweetrolls and mead.

ResearchProjectDef.label: wine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Plant grapes which can then be used to create wine must and eventually, high quality wine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: alchemy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to plant various alchemical ingredients and combining them into different draughts at an alchemy lab.

ResearchProjectDef.label: medieval architecture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to construct various medieval structures, including cloth walls.
